SEARCH
Package Users

Class User

java.lang.Object
Users.User
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Buyer, Seller
public abstract class User extends Object implements Serializable
Abstract class representing a user. A user can be a Buyer or a Seller. This class implements java.io.Serializable.
See Also:

    • toString

      public String toString()

      Overrides:

      Returns:
